==Overview==
The '''Karems ''' is a [[human]] hunter-gatherer society based in the [[Savage Land]].{{r|Ka-Zar the Savage #33}}

==Events==
Many of the Karem were abducted by [[Nuwali]] thanks to teleportation "[[Motyka Bone]]," a bone lost for decades. The Karem believed the the bone would transport them to heaven.{{r|Ka-Zar the Savage #34}} 

They remained lost until until the "Motyka Bone" was found by [[Parnival Plunder (Earth-616)|Parnival Plunder]]. He teleported [[Ka-Zar]] and [[Shanna]] to the planet [[Tomriv]], where they freed the prisoners of Karem from the Nuwali and brought them back to Earth.{{r|Ka-Zar the Savage #33}}
